name: Doug Surdulli
title: Senior Software Engineer
introduction: I am an experienced Senior Software Engineer with **10 years** of expertise in delivering high-impact products to millions of users across diverse industries, including fintech, legal-tech, insurance-tech, and web agencies. I specialize in frontend architecture and engineering leadership, with a strong focus on accessibility, UX, and building scalable codebases.

experience.description: As an Independent Contractor, I have provided guidance, leadership, and direct code contributions to various organizations, from SaaS startups, to web agencies.
accomplishments: Led engineering discovery at XWP for Are Media, securing **$1M+** in revenue and a long-term partnership.
Developed company-wide frontend starter kit at XWP, improving delivery time by **40%**.
Transformed a legacy React app into a monorepo with TypeScript, boosting development speed by **50%**.
Led the creation of design system libraries, which streamlined the creation of apps.
Invented a novel solution to a complex React rendering issue where simple SSR wasn't possible. [See blog](https://xwp.co/how-we-built-a-world-first-rendering-solution-for-ofx/).
Skills: TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Next.js, Storybook, accessibility, web performance, design systems.

experience.description: As a Senior Frontend Engineer at Tally, I led the development of various frontend projects within the Web SDK during a business pivot from B2C to B2B.
accomplishments: Scaled Web SDK with multiple entry points, reducing new development time by **90%** for similar features.
Led web authentication integration, collaborating across mobile, backend, and web teams.
Led end-to-end feature development, collaborating with stakeholders to define specifications and delegating tasks to mid-level engineers, improving team efficiency by **30%**.
Skills: TypeScript, HTML, CSS, React, Next.js, SDK development, iframe API, design system, accessibility.

experience.description: As a Senior Frontend Engineer at Symend, I led multiple frontend projects and delivered them successfully. Worked with many stakeholders to facilitate feature development to ensure delivery on time for a major migration.
accomplishments: Improved cross-team collaboration with API design meetings and **OpenAPI** documentation.
Implemented **Playwright** for end-to-end testing, enhancing code confidence and reducing regressions significantly.
Led feature development, working closely with stakeholders to create clear specs and deliver effective, high-quality solutions.
Skills: TypeScript, HTML, CSS, React, Vite, Playwright, multi-tenancy, msw.
